title: Hacked and account messed up
body:
Holy shit.... long story short, I had all my friends removed, IP spent on RUNES, and worst of all, the guy rerollled and disenchanted all my hextech shards. I had quite a lot and some of them were legendary and epic skins. Is there any way I can get anything back?  I'm so goddamn pissed... it really takes a while to earn all of that. Also, they played and trolled/inted in 2 ranked games. I'm not high elo or anything, but it's really frustrating because I was one win away from promos.
If nothing can be done, someone at least be here for me because it's a bit lonely with an empty friends list :/

replies.body: Rest easy, we can help and certainly do our best to make reparations.  First thing first, wee need to get the account back in your hands.  Reach out to our account recovery team through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and we'll help restore access.  From there, your specialist will be able to help with content recovery.  We got you, and will reply back as soon as we can!
